# House Rastinon
## Overview
---
## Connections
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Rastinon Sawmill]] ; Owned by House Rastinon
Employer: [[Haas Trevelion]] ; Haas works for House Rastinon.
Owner: [[Villis Rastinon]] ; Villis is Master Merchant of House Rastinon.
Parent: [[Wentner Rastinon]] ; Wentner is the eldest son of House Rastinon.
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Caravan Staging Yards]] ; House Rastinon owns a staging yard.
Publicly Annoyed Towards: [[House Valkanor]] ; House Valkanor is a business rival of House Rastinon.
Residence: [[House Rastinon Compound]] ; House Rastinon resides in the House Rastinon Compound.
Resident: [[Ajinan]] ; House Rastinon is located in Ajinan.
